data.title: MAYANG ANCHALIK COLLEGE : NAAC Accredited A+ Grade With CGPA 3.37
data.text:
Vacancy Position

Applications are invited along with complete Bio-data and self-attested copies of all testimonials from the eligible candidates for direct recruitment of the vacant Sanctioned Posts of Grade-IV.

Re-Form Fill up Notice 2024

New Examination form fill up notice for GU FYUGP 2nd Semester Student for the session 2023-24.

Advertisement - 2024

Advertisement for the Post of Principal in Mayang Anchalik College...

KKHSOU Admission - 2023-24

See the Admission Banner here...

See the Schedule here...

Induction Programme - 2023-24

Date:31-07-2023:Induction Programme for the newly admitted student for the session 2023-24 is scheduled on 01-08-2023 and 02-08-2023.

See the Notice here...

See the Schedule here...

Readmission Notice 2023-24

Dated: 29-06-2023: The online readmission portal for BA and BVoc. 3rd and 5th semester will be live from 30-06-2023 onwards. The last date of readmission is 15-07-2023.

See the details here.

Revised Admission Notice 2023-24

Dated: 29-06-2023: The online application link for BA and BVoc. 1st Semester in Samarth Portal is extended upto 03-07-2023. The documents verification and admission will be started from 07-07-2023 onwards.

See the details here.

Admission Notice 2023-24

Dated: 25-06-2023: The online application link for BA and BVoc. 1st Semester will be closed on 28-06-2023. The documents verification and admission will be started from 05-07-2023 onwards.

See the details here.

Class Open Notice 2022-23

Dated: 15-06-2023: The regular class of BA 3rd and 5th semester is going on from 12th June, 2023. Therefor, all the students are asked to attend the regular class to maintain their class attendance up to 75%.

See the details here.

Samarth Spot Admission 2024-25

Date:28-06-2024:Mayang Anchalik College open the spot admission portal in Samarth to be held in the college premise from 29-06-2024 to 07-07-2024

See the Notice here...

World Environment Day 2024

Date:31-05-2024:Mayang Anchalik College is going to organize “World Environment Day” on 5th June 2024 at College Campus. Therefore, the organizing committee would like to invite you to join in the occasion.

See the Notice here...

Induction Programme - 2023-24

Date:31-07-2023:Induction Programme for the newly admitted student for the session 2023-24 is scheduled on 01-08-2023 and 02-08-2023.

See the Notice here...

See the Schedule here...

ADMISSION BROCHURE - 2023-24

See the details here...

KARATE-DO CHAMPIONSHIP - 2022

Date:24-12-2022:Invitation for 6th State Goju Ryu Okinawakan Karate Championship 2022, held on 25th December, 2022.

See the details here...

INVITATION LETTER

Date:24-12-2022:Invitation for General Meeting, held on 25th December, 2022 on NAAC Assessment Result Discussion and Analysis, where Mayang ANchalik College got A Rank with CGPA 3.37.

See the details here...

TRAINING PROGRAMME

Date:08-09-2022:The Dipon Chandra Nath Library and IQAC, Mayang Anchalik College jointly organizes a Training Programme on 10th September, 2022 at 12:30 PM on the Topic of "Training Programme on E-Resource : Their Importance". The resource Person of the Programme will be Dr. Hirak Jyoti Hazarika, Librarian, Assam Don Bosco University, Guwahati, Assam, India.

See the details here...

NATIONAL SEMINAR

Date:08-09-2022:The IQAC, Mayang Anchalik College in collaboration with International Journal of Interdisciplinary Research in Science, Society and Culture (IJIRSSC) organizes a National Seminar on 20th September, 2022 on the Topic of "Impact of Globalization on Economy, Society, Education and Culture in North-East India".

See the details here...

International Yoga Day

Date:21-06-2022:On the occasion of International Yoga Day, Mayang Anchalik College organizes an event in College Indoor Stadium. Therefor, All the teachers, non-teaching staff and students are requested to present in the event.

See the details here...

Banner of the event...

World Environment Day

Date:01-06-2022:On the occasion of World Environment Day, Mayang Anchalik College invites the participants to join the day long activities organised by the college on 5th June, 2022.

See the details here...

Gandhi Jayanti

Date:27-09-2021:On the occasion of Gandhi Jayanti, Mayang Anchalik College will conclude the the Freedom Run 2.0 conducted by the college from 15 August, 2021.

See the details here...

UG 4th Sem Meeting

Date:20-09-2021:This is to inform the students of UG 4th Semester, that an online meeting will be held on Google Meet with all the students. The meeting will be from 7:00 pm, and attendance is mandatory for all.

See the details here...

RASHTRA GAAN

Date:12-08-2021:As per UGC guideline, the students and faculty members of the college may contribute their individual rendering of the National Anthem of India at https://rashtragaan.in. The college on its part will conduct a rendering of the anthem tomorrow in the college premises at 9:30 am. Interested students and faculty can visit the college for the same, following all Covid - 19 protocols.

See the details here...

Fit India Freedom Run 2.0

Date:12-08-2021:As part of the celebration of the 75 years of Indian Independence, the government of India has launched the "Fit India Freedom Run 2.0" with the aim to make all citizens include physical activity of at least 30 minutes daily.In this regard, Mayang Anchalik College will organise a fitness run from 13 August to 2 October 2021, to encourage the students and faculty members to promote physical exercises.

See the details here...

NATIONAL WEBINAR

Date:07-08-2021:The Political Science Department in collaboration with IQAC, Mayang Anchalik College organizes a National Webinar on 14th August, 2021 from 11:00 AM on the Topic of "GLOBAL IMPACT OF COVID – 19 IN THE POLITICAL ARENA". The resource Person of the Webinar will be Prof. Arupjyoti Choudhury, Registrar, Krishna Kanta Handiqui State Open University, Assam, India.

See the details here...

NATIONAL WEBINAR

Date:23-07-2021:The History Department in collaboration with IQAC, Mayang Anchalik College organizes a National Webinar on 28th July, 2021 from 11:00 AM on the Topic of "Assam's Response to the Bangle Partition of 1905". The resource Person of the Webinar will be Dr. Mitali Kalita, Assistant Professor, Department of History, Royal Global University

See the details here...

ONE DAY WEBINAR

Date:08-07-2021:The Assamese Department, Mayang Anchalik College organizes a National Webinar on 15th July, 2021 from 05:00 PM. The resource Person of the Webinar will be Dr. Bibash Choudhury, HOD, Department of English, Gauhati University

See the details here...
